verse.name: v1
verse.lines: No, not despairingly come I to Thee; no, not distrustingly bend I the knee; sin hath gone over me, yet is this still my plea, Jesus hath died.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Ah! Mine iniquity crimson has been, infinite, infinite sin upon sin; sin of not loving Thee, sin of not trusting Thee, infinite sin.

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: Faithful and just art Thou, forgiving all; loving and kind art Thou when poor ones call; Lord, let the cleansing blood, blood of the Lamb of God, pass o'er my soul.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Then all is peace and light this soul within; thus shall I walk with Thee, the loved Unseen; leaning on Thee, my God, guided along the road, nothing between.
